actions.name: Basic Mode
actions.description: Deal 2 damage and 1 mark to 1 target you can see.

optionalEffectList.name: Second Lock Effect
optionalEffectList.description: Deal 1 mark to a different target you can see.

conditionList.name: Target is not in target list

actions.name: Basic Mode
actions.description: Choose 1 or 2 targets you can see and deal 1 damage to each.

optionalEffectList.name: Focus Shot Effect
optionalEffectList.description: Deal 1 additional damage to one of those targets.

optionalEffectList.name: Turret Tripod Effect
optionalEffectList.description: Deal 1 additional damage to the other of those targets and/or deal 1 damage to a different target you can see.

conditionList.name: Target is not in target list

actions.name: Basic Mode
actions.description: Deal 2 damage to 1 target you can see.

optionalEffectList.name: Chain Reaction Effect
optionalEffectList.description: Deal 1 damage to a second target that your first target can see.

conditionList.name: Target is not in target list

optionalEffectList.name: High Voltage Effect
optionalEffectList.description: Deal 2 damage to a third target that your second target can see. You cannot use this effect unless you first use the chain reaction

conditionList.name: Target is not in target list
Target is not in target list

actions.name: Basic Mode
actions.description: Deal 2 damage to 1 target you can see.

optionalEffectList.name: Phase Glide Effect
optionalEffectList.description: Move 1 or 2 squares. This effect can be used either before or after the basic effect.

optionalEffectList.name: Charged Shot Effect
optionalEffectList.description: Deal 1 additional damage to your target.

actions.name: Basic Mode
actions.description: Deal 3 damage and 1 mark to 1 target you can see. Your target must be at least 2 moves away from you

actions.name: Basic Mode
actions.description: Deal 1 damage to every other player on your square.

actions.name: Reaper Mode
actions.description: Deal 2 damage to every other player on your square.

actions.name: Basic Mode
actions.description: Move a target 0, 1, or 2 squares to a square you can see, and give it 1 damage.

actions.name: Punisher Mode
actions.description: Choose a target 0, 1, or 2 moves away from you. Move the target to your square and deal 3 damage to it.

actions.name: Basic Mode
actions.description: Choose a square you can see, but not your square. Call it "the vortex". Choose a target on the vortex or 1 move away from it. Move it onto the vortex and give it 2 damage.

optionalEffectList.name: Black Hole Effect
optionalEffectList.description: Choose up to 2 other targets on the vortex or 1 move away from it. Move them onto the vortex and give them each 1 damage.

conditionList.name: Target is not in target list

actions.name: Basic Mode
actions.description: Choose a room you can see, but not the room you are in. Deal 1 damage to everyone in that room.

actions.name: Cozy Fire Mode
actions.description: Choose a square exactly one move away. Deal 1 damage and 1 mark to everyone on that square.

actions.name: Basic Mode
actions.description: Choose 1 target you cannot see and deal 3 damage to it.

actions.name: Basic Mode
actions.description: Deal 1 damage to 1 target you can see at least 1 move away. Then give 1 mark to that target and everyone else on that square.

actions.name: Nano-Tracer Mode
actions.description: Deal 1 damage to 1 target you can see at least 1 move away. Then give 2 marks to that target and everyone else on that square.

actions.name: Basic Mode
actions.description: Choose a square 1 move away and possibly a second square 1 more move away in the same direction. On each square, you may choose 1 target and give it 1 damage.

actions.name: Barbecue Mode
actions.description: Choose 2 squares as above. Deal 2 damage to everyone on the first square and 1 damage to everyone on the second square.

actions.name: Basic Mode
actions.description: Deal 1 damage to 1 target you can see. Then you may move the target 1 square.

optionalEffectList.name: Extra Grenade Effect
optionalEffectList.description: Deal 1 damage to every player on a square you can see. You can use this before or after the basic effect's move.

actions.name: Basic Mode
actions.description: Deal 2 damage to 1 target you can see that is not on your square. Then you may move the target 1 square.

optionalEffectList.name: Rocket Jump Effect
optionalEffectList.description: Move 1 or 2 squares. This effect can be used either before or after the basic effect.

optionalEffectList.name: Fragmenting Warhead Effect
optionalEffectList.description: During the basic effect, deal 1 damage to every player on your target's original square – including the target, even if you move it.

actions.name: Basic Mode
actions.description: Choose a cardinal direction and 1 target in that direction. Deal 3 damage to it.

actions.name: Piercing Mode
actions.description: Choose a cardinal direction and 1 or 2 targets in that direction. Deal 2 damage to each.

actions.name: Basic Mode
actions.description: Deal 2 damage to 1 target on your square.

optionalEffectList.name: Shadowstep Effect
optionalEffectList.description: Move 1 square before or after the basic effect.

optionalEffectList.name: Slice and Dice Effect
optionalEffectList.description: Deal 2 damage to a different target on your square. The shadowstep may be used before or after this effect.

conditionList.name: Target is not in target list

actions.name: Basic Mode
actions.description: Deal 1 damage and 2 marks to 1 target you can see.

actions.name: Scanner Mode
actions.description: Choose up to 3 targets you can see and deal 1 mark to each.

actions.name: Basic Mode
actions.description: Deal 3 damage to 1 target on your square. If you want, you may then move the target 1 square.

actions.name: Long Barrel Mode
actions.description: Deal 2 damage to 1 target on any square exactly one move away.

actions.name: Basic Mode
actions.description: Choose 1 target on any square exactly 1 move away. Move onto that square and give the target 1 damage and 2 marks.

actions.name: Rocket Fist Mode
actions.description: Choose a square exactly 1 move away. Move onto that square. You may deal 2 damage to 1 target there. If you want, you may move 1 more square in that same direction (but only if it is a legal move). You may deal 2 damage to 1 target there, as well.

actions.name: Basic Mode
actions.description: Choose up to 3 targets on different squares, each exactly 1 move away. Deal 1 damage to each target.

actions.name: Tsunami Mode
actions.description: Deal 1 damage to all targets that are exactly 1 move away.

actions.name: Basic Mode
actions.description: Deal 2 damage to 1 target on your square.

actions.name: Pulverize Mode
actions.description: Deal 3 damage to 1 target on your square, then move that target 0, 1, or 2 squares in one direction.
